description.p:
This addon implements the opened platform called Open Toutatice (which one is based on the Nuxeo DM distribution)
Main features : * Possibility to contribute on widget type for widget BO-FO mapping service * Move and reorder of documents in publish spaces * New webIds policy * Remote sections informations available for Portal * Suggest Users Widget filtering on permission on current document * Publication date taken into account in list requests * Part of web mode in opentoutatice-web-mode plugin henceforth
Bug fixes : * #929: Error on contentView after asynchronous treatment which can have removed documents * #963, #970: refactoring of fragments portlet * #971: loop on sub tab Administration -> Publication * #1000: custom of multiple vocabulary widget * #1000: simplified PortalViews * #1002: Enlargeable Images * #1013: webids activated on Spaces by default * Fixes nullPointer in WidgetAdapterServiceImpl in web mode * Fixes theme and template saving in web mode * Fixes duplication of publishing_status widget insertion * Fixes permissions for imports of zip * Fixes escape of "bad" webids (because a good webid has no character to escape) * Fixes internationalization of vocabularies entries label * Fixes Multi-levels vocabularies cycles
